short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't want to 'like' tweets? Why not raise a glass? Always drink responsibly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Liked twitter stars? Maybe you just hate hearts?

I don't know about you, but all this debate is making me mighty thirsty...

Updates:

Version 1.0.3: replaces hearts in the Notifications tab
Version 1.0.2: icons for extension
Version 1.0.1: new icon injection works with new tweets
